articles.title: Altoona Sunrise Rotary awards $4,500 grant to United Fire Department
articles.description: Altoona Sunrise Rotary supports Community Service Projects each year. This year’s Community Grant is awarded to advanced fire emergency to handle modern technology fire suppression. Two Electric Vehicle Fire Suppression Blankets will be purchased and maintained by United Fire Department, located at 611 Grandview Road, Logan Township. These blankets will be made available to any […]
articles.content:
Altoona Sunrise Rotary supports Community Service Projects each year.
This year’s Community Grant is awarded to advanced fire emergency to handle modern technology fire suppression.
Two Electric Vehicle Fire Suppression Blankets will be purchased and... [990 chars]

articles.title: India to hold 4-day ‘International Science Festival’ at Chandigarh: Dr Jitendra
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent NEW DELHI, Oct 17: Union Minister of State (Independent Charge) for Science and Technology; Earth Sciences and Minister of State for PMO, Department of Atomic Energy, Department of Space, Personnel, Public Grievances and Pensions, Dr. Jitendra Singh today launched the curtain raiser for the India International Science Festival (IISF) 2025, describing it as a “celebration of science” that complements the country’s growing spirit of scientific inquiry and innovation. Addressing the gathering, Dr. Jitendra Singh said the festival will […]
articles.content:
Excelsior Correspondent
NEW DELHI, Oct 17: Union Minister of State (Independent Charge) for Science and Technology; Earth Sciences and Minister of State for PMO, Department of Atomic Energy, Department of Space, Personnel, Public Grievances and Pensi... [3547 chars]

articles.title: MOTOTECH 2025 Returns to Pune, Accelerates Auto Innovation
articles.description: The two-day event featured live technology showcases, expert panel discussions, and industry collaborations aimed at shaping a future-ready, globally competitive automotive sector
articles.content: MOTOTECH 2025, India’s premier automotive expo and conference, returned to Pune on October 9–10, spotlighting innovation, sustainability, and growth. The two-day event featured live technology showcases, expert panel discussions, and industry collabo... [2662 chars]

articles.title: SMVDU joins first PAIR consortium meeting at IIT Ropar
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent JAMMU, Oct 17: Shri Mata Vaishno Devi University (SMVDU), Katra, participated in the first meeting of the PAIR (Partnerships for Advancing Interdisciplinary Research) consortium held at the Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Ropar. The meeting was chaired by Dr Shivkumar Kalyanaraman, CEO of the Anusandhan National Research Foundation (ANRF). Prof Pragati Kumar, Vice Chancellor of SMVDU, also attended and interacted with ANRF officials and consortium partners. Prof Pragati Kumar appreciated the efforts of the research team and expressed […]
articles.content:
Excelsior Correspondent
JAMMU, Oct 17: Shri Mata Vaishno Devi University (SMVDU), Katra, participated in the first meeting of the PAIR (Partnerships for Advancing Interdisciplinary Research) consortium held at the Indian Institute of Technology (IIT)... [1304 chars]

articles.title: FIRs quashed against VC, varsity officials over religious conversions
articles.description: The Supreme Court on Friday quashed FIRs against the vice-chancellor and other officials of the Sam Higginbottom University of Agriculture Technology and Science (SHUATS), Prayagraj, over their alleged involvement in forced religious conversion.
articles.content:
The Supreme Court on Friday quashed FIRs against the vice-chancellor and other officials of the Sam Higginbottom University of Agriculture Technology and Science (SHUATS), Prayagraj, over their alleged involvement in forced religious conversion.
A Be... [1597 chars]

articles.title: ICE Ramps Up Tracking Antifa With Spying Technology
articles.description: Immigration and Customs Enforcement has dramatically expanded its surveillance arsenal in recent months, signing millions in new tech contracts to pursue both immigration violators and what the Trump administration has called radical antifa-linked agitators.
articles.content: Immigration and Customs Enforcement has dramatically expanded its surveillance arsenal in recent months, signing millions in new tech contracts to pursue both immigration violators and what the Trump administration has called radical antifa-linked ag... [2636 chars]

articles.title: Zonta Club of Austin announce Zonta Women in STEM Award applications available
articles.description: Applications for the 2026 Zonta Women in STEM Award Applications are now available from the Zonta Club of Austin by contacting Mary Jo Follmuth either by email at austinmnzonta@hotmail.com or phone 507-383-5571. The Zonta Women in STEM Award uplifts innovation and celebrates the remarkable accomplishments of women between 18-35 years of age in science, technology, […]
articles.content:
Getting your Trinity Audio player ready...
Applications for the 2026 Zonta Women in STEM Award Applications are now available from the Zonta Club of Austin by contacting Mary Jo Follmuth either by email at austinmnzonta@hotmail.com or phone 507-383-5... [839 chars]

articles.title: PyroGenesis Announces Repricing and Extension to Term of Warrants
articles.description: MONTREAL, Oct. 17, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- PyroGenesis Inc. ('PyroGenesis”) (TSX: PYR) (OTCQX: PYRGF) (FRA: 8PY1), the leader in innovating for ultra-high temperature processes and engineering, and a technology provider to heavy industry & defense, announces today that up to 1,581,250 common share purchase warrants (the 'Warrants”) will be amended.
articles.content: MONTREAL, Oct. 17, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- PyroGenesis Inc. ("PyroGenesis”) (TSX: PYR) (OTCQX: PYRGF) (FRA: 8PY1), the leader in innovating for ultra-high temperature processes and engineering, and a technology provider to heavy industry & defense, ... [5158 chars]
